115.1 Messenger

A private messenger for disciples of Jesus.

Screenshots

Description

Our mission is to provide a secure suite of digital tools to help disciples of Jesus connect with each other and their supporters globally, without risk of personal attack or restrictions on their freedom of speech.

Make group voice and video calls with up to 8 people on iOS, Android, and desktop. All calls are made over a Wi-Fi or data connection and (with the exception of data fees) are free of charge, including long-distance and international.

Security features include:

  • State-of-the-art end-to-end encryption keeps your conversations secure. We can't read your messages or listen to your calls, and no one else can either.
  • The app is powered by our own servers that are not shared with anybody else. Facebook, Google, or Apple cannot get hold of your data. We don’t store your messages and therefore you will always be safe.
  • Photos that you share are automatically stripped of metadata that could reveal your location. There is even a tool to blur the faces of people in your photographs. Our app also has disappearing messages – which are automatically deleted after a specified period of time.
